name: Super Bricked!
description:
This is Super Bricked! 

You control a paddle with your mouse, and try to bounce the ball into the bricks to destroy them!

You only get 1 ball(not counting special powerups) so don't lose it!

There are 4 levels to play through, but you must beat them consecutively, once you lose, you have to start over again.

**This is still in development but has been tested to be playable.***

Uploaded for Beginner Jam

Have fun!
